title: People's Pops: 55 Recipes for Ice Pops, Shave Ice, and Boozy Pop
description:
People's Pops
55 Recipes for Ice Pops, Shave Ice, and Boozy Pops from Brooklyn's Coolest Pop Shop
by Nathalie Jordi, David Carrell, Joel Horowitz
Ten Speed Press | 2013 | EPUB | 128 Pages

A flavor-packed collection of 65 recipes from the trio behind the premier pops stand in the country, PeopleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Pops.

In 2008, three old friends had a hunch that the world deserved a better ice pop. Every summer since, New York CityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been taken by storm with out-of-the-box flavors like Raspberries & Basil, Peach & Bourbon, and Cantaloupe & Tarragon from PeopleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Pops. Now, the People behind the phenomenon share their DIY ethos in a breezy cookbook that teaches how to pair ingredients, balance sweetness, and explore fruits (and vegetables and herbs!)--in simple recipes that work with standard ice pop molds or improvised ones. With a chapter devoted to shave ice plus recipes for grownup boozy pops sprinkled throughout, PeopleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Pops proves itself top of the pops.

About the Author
Joel Horowitz, Nathalie Jordi, and David Carrell founded PeopleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Pops in 2008. They live in Brooklyn, New York.
